feed.title: GoDoxy Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for GoDoxy: v0.10.1
entry.content:
Changes

  • OIDC: Simplified code and partially fixed #82 62776229cb8a95a82911d0d6b4f6ce9a3f7f1516 36fab0cd5053b73c39bd9b245f73ca5f6346109c
  • Dependencies upgraded 8f0366298210f4d58c30652eaac69bea20447be6

entry.title: New release for GoDoxy: v0.10.2
entry.content:
Fixed

  • Cookie domain not being set correctly after logging in WebUI 0a8aa2b215a2ca9fb41f7a7046b4900314653f67
  • Panic on middleware error 23482da259e34631545426c02392ec705a412d04

entry.title: New release for GoDoxy: v0.11.0
entry.content:
New features

  • ACL: connection level IP blocking
  • IP/CIDR blocking
  • Geo-location blocking (ISO Country Code / Time Zone) (Maxmind account required)
  • ACL logging
  • Maxmind database auto update
  • Access log rotation
  • Idle Sleep support for Proxmox LXCs
  • Security: drop X-Powered-By and Server headers before responding to clients
  • HTTP/3 support
  • OIDC: Support token refreshing with offline_access scope

Fixes

  • redirectHTTP middleware should now work behind another proxy

Changes

  • Added all DNS providers that's supported by LEGO
  • Remove prometheus support, planning to add HTTP statistics to WebUI
  • No longer needs GODOXY_OIDC_REDIRECT_URL
  • More verbose-ish logging (showing each routes being created / removed) for easier debugging
  • Now a user must match both OIDC_ALLOWED_USERS and OIDC_ALLOWED_GROUPS in order to log in, instead of matching either one

Full Changelog: https://github.com/yusing/godoxy/compare/v0.10.2...v0.11.0

entry.title: New release for GoDoxy: v0.11.1
entry.content:
Fixed

  • Route details not being shown properly on the WebUI
  • Login Issue with user password authentication
  • Fileserver routes being excluded
  • Invalid Instruction crash for some processors with older architecture caused by to a third-party JSON library bytedance/sonic

entry.title: New release for GoDoxy: v0.11.2
entry.content:
Fixed

  • OIDC: logout not working if user was denied access
  • Agents: loosen version checking to major version checking only
  • warn when version mismatch instead of error
  • Add update functionality to system agent install script
  • Large agent binary size (shrunk back to 16MB)
